alphanumeric: 1. Basic research (principles postulated and observed but no experimental proof available)
label: BasicResearch

alphanumeric: 2. Technology formulation (concept and application have been formulated)
label: TechnologyFormulation

alphanumeric: 3. Applied research (first laboratory tests completed; proof of concept)
label: AppliedResearch

alphanumeric: 4. Small scale prototype (built in a laboratory environment)
label: SmallScalePrototype

alphanumeric: 5. Large scale prototype (tested in intended environment)
label: LargeScalePrototype

alphanumeric: 6. Prototype system (tested in intended environment close to expected performance)
label: SystemTestedPrototype

alphanumeric: 7. Demonstration system (operating in operational environment at pre-commercial scale)
label: DemoSystem

alphanumeric: 9. Full commercial application (technology available for consumers)
label: FullCommercialApplication
